name: Neighbor
text:
Neighbor
"There's nobody in there! They left, they just left!"
An unidentified woman lived next door to Gersten Hayward at 1601 Timber Lake Drive, Twin Peaks, Washington.
One day, hearing a commotion in the hallway outside her unit, the neighbor stuck her head out the door to tell Becky Burnett that nobody was inside Gersten's apartment, as "they" had just left. Becky, nonetheless, cursed her husband Steven and fired a gun through Gersten's closed door.
